text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/cited-artifact-status-type defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
created Created The content was originally constructed or composed.
submitted Submitted The content was sent to the publisher for consideration of publication.
withdrawn Withdrawn The content that was not published has been removed from consideration for publishing by the submitter.
pre-review Pre review The content is awaiting assignment and delivery to reviewer(s).
under-review Under review The content is in a state of being reviewed.
post-review-pre-published Post review pre published The content is in a state between the review(s) being completed and being published.
rejected Rejected The content that was not published has been removed from consideration for publishing by a publisher or editor.
published-early-form Published early form The content is published but future changes to the published version are expected.
published-final-form Published final form The content is published and further changes to the content are not expected.
accepted Accepted The content that was not published yet has been approved for publication by the publisher and/or editor.
archived Archived The content is retired or considered no longer current but still available as part of the public record.
retracted Retracted The content that was published is removed from publication and should no longer be considered part of the public record.
draft Draft The content is considered unfinished or incomplete and not representative of the current state desired by the content creator.
active Active The content is considered complete for its current state by the content creator.
approved Approved The content has been approved for a state transition, with the focus of approval described in the text associated with this coding.
unknown Unknown The status of the content is not recorded in the metadata.

concept.definition: The content was originally constructed or composed.
The content was sent to the publisher for consideration of publication.
The content that was not published has been removed from consideration for publishing by the submitter.
The content is awaiting assignment and delivery to reviewer(s).
The content is in a state of being reviewed.
The content is in a state between the review(s) being completed and being published.
The content that was not published has been removed from consideration for publishing by a publisher or editor.
The content is published but future changes to the published version are expected.
The content is published and further changes to the content are not expected.
The content that was not published yet has been approved for publication by the publisher and/or editor.
The content is retired or considered no longer current but still available as part of the public record.
The content that was published is removed from publication and should no longer be considered part of the public record.
The content is considered unfinished or incomplete and not representative of the current state desired by the content creator.
The content is considered complete for its current state by the content creator.
The content has been approved for a state transition, with the focus of approval described in the text associated with this coding.
The status of the content is not recorded in the metadata.
